name: Oybō Mykonos
description:
You might not be able to hop a flight to Athens pronto, but you can put these Oybō Mykonos socks on your feet. Featuring muted tones, cool cotton, and a Mediterranean aesthetic that demands moccassins and high water pants, at least you’ll look like you could be island hopping through the Cyclades.

95% cotton
5% elastine

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44

N.b. All Oybō socks are mismatched.

name: Oybō Oporto
description:
Being a well-travelled man of leisure, your mind is now conjuring images of Portugal’s second largest city, not fast food, as you read this. Which means that the team at Oybō has hit the mark for the colours in these socks remind them of a Porto sunset. We like that. And we like these socks.

95% cotton
5% elastine

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44

N.b. All Oybō socks are mismatched.

name: Oybō Kobe Green
description:
Stripes on one foot, crouton sized clusters of stripes on the other. We give you the Oybō Kobe in green and gold. We grant that they’re probably not as tasty as the beef, but the Kobe is just the sock to add a bit of Japanese Zen to your look.

95% cotton
5% elastine

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44

N.b. All Oybō socks are mismatched.

name: Oybō Mini Boston
description:
If you tend to think that cricket today is ‘just not cricket’ you might appreciate the inspiration behind Oybō’s Mini Boston. Harking back to a time when cricketers wore whites and tennis racquets were made of wood, the Mini Boston calls to mind the easy style of the Rod Lavers and Imran Khans of professional sport.

95% cotton
5% elastine

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44

N.b. All Oybō socks are mismatched.

name: Oybō Agave
description:
It is said that Agave nectar is about one-and-a-half times sweeter than sugar. Now, we haven’t sent the Oybō Agaves off to the lab yet, but just look at them. These socks are sweeter than most. Inspired by days under the southern Italian sun, the Agaves will add some Sicilian style swagger to your step.

95% cotton
5% elastine

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44
These socks finish below the knee.

N.B. All Oybō socks are mismatched.

name: Oybō Kobe
description:
Stipes on one foot, crouton sized clusters of stripes on the other. We give you the Oybō Kobe in beige and blue. We grant that they’re probably not as tasty as the beef, but the Kobe is just the sock to add a bit of Japanese Zen to your look.

95% cotton
5% elastine

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44

N.b. All Oybō socks are mismatched.

name: Oybō DeMedici
description:
Fancy yourself as a bit of a diplomat slash patron of the arts? You may not have been born in Florence or baptised Lorenzo, but Oybō’s DeMedici socks will bring out the inner statesman in you. Perfect for building empires, attending to matters of state and sucking down a spritz or two.

95% cotton
5% elastine

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44
These socks finish below the knee.

N.B. All Oybō socks are mismatched.

name: Oybō Lemon Squeeze
description:
‘Lemon difficult.’ We have no idea what it means, but we remember Chris Addision’s character uttering the phrase in 'In the Loop', the movie length spin-off to Armando Iannucci’s 'The Thick of It'. Fortunately, there is nothing difficult about these Oybō socks. Pair them with a nice suit, chinos or denim to add a little zest to your ankles. Lemon easy, really.

95% cotton
5% elastine

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44
These socks finish below the knee.

N.B. All Oybō socks are mismatched.

name: Oybō Versailles
description:
The French cousin of the Oybō DeMedici, the Versailles socks feature the same Fleur-de-lis motif only this time in les bleus. Perfect for putting the fear of the Ancien Regime into whomever should find themselves sitting across from you at the negotiating table.


95% cotton
5% elastine

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44
These socks finish below the knee.

N.B. All Oybō socks are mismatched.

name: Oybō Baton Rouge
description:
Le bâton rouge was a blood-stained stick, upon which a number of animals had been impaled, that the Frenchman, Sieur d'Iberville, happened upon while venturing up the Mighty Mississippi back in the day. Featuring très franco shades of red and blue as well as a natural hue that calls to mind the Muddy Miss’, Oybō’s Baton Rouge socks represent the perfect symbiosis of ‘Old Europe’ and the new world.

95% cotton
5% elastine

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44
These socks finish below the knee.

N.B. All Oybō socks are mismatched.

name: Oybō Pirates
description:
Yo-ho-ho and a pair of anchor-emblazoned socks. OK, we’re the first to admit that our sea shanty needs some work, but these Oybō socks sure don’t. Crafted from 100% cotton in cool cream and featuring an anchor motif in a nice shade of purple, these socks will look the goods on old salty dogs and ocean leaning landlubbers alike.

95% cotton
5% elastine

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44
These socks finish below the knee.

N.B. All Oybō socks are mismatched.

name: Oybō Sashimi
description:
Some like it raw. We reckon there’s a movie in that, but back to these Oybō socks. Inspired by the raw meats of Japan, the Sashimi—literally, pierced body—socks are the perfect antidote to the humdrum of everyday life.

95% cotton
5% elastine

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44
These socks finish below the knee.

N.B. All Oybō socks are mismatched.

name: Yarn Works 9 Grey
description:
A postmodern pastiche of zigzags and geometric patterns, these Yarn Works socks communicate a “mesh” of civilizations, not a “clash.” Whether you’re looking to communicate your preference for cross cultural harmony on your ankles or you just want a strikingly good looking pair of socks, these guys will do it. They are pictured here in grey, black and white.

95% cotton
5% polyester

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44

name: Yarn Works 9 Green
description:
A postmodern pastiche of zigzags and geometric patterns, these Yarn Works socks communicate a “mesh” of civilizations, not a “clash.” Whether you’re looking to communicate your preference for cross cultural harmony on your ankles or you just want a strikingly good looking pair of socks, these guys will do it. They are pictured here in green, blue and white.

95% cotton

ONE SIZE

name: Yarn Works 9 Red
description:
A postmodern pastiche of zigzags and geometric patterns, these Yarn Works socks communicate a “mesh” of civilizations, not a “clash.” Whether you’re looking to communicate your preference for cross cultural harmony on your ankles or you just want a strikingly good looking pair of socks, these guys will do it. 95% cotton

name: Yarn Works 7 Grey and Green
description:
The father and son team at Yarn Works socks clearly have a thing for the ancient Greek pastime of Geometry. The old boy and junior turn out mathematically sound geometric designs that would impress even Thales and Pythagoras. Here they have gone for cool mint, red, green and electric blue. We approve.

95% cotton
5% polyester

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44

name: Yarn Works 7 Yellow
description:
The father and son team at Yarn Works socks clearly have a thing for the ancient Greek pastime of Geometry. The old boy and junior turn out fetching geometric designs that would impress even Thales and Pythagoras. Although, in yellow, orange and blue we grant you that this particular pair’s ancestry might be more Babylonian than Ioanian.

95% cotton
5% polyester

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44

name: Yarn Works 7 Purple
description:
The father and son team at Yarn Works socks clearly have a thing for the ancient Greek pastime of Geometry. The old boy and junior turn out mathematically sound geometric designs that would impress even Thales and Pythagoras. This pair, featuring a regal shade of purple as well greens and reds is particularly nice.

95% cotton
5% polyester

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44

name: Yarn Works 6 Red
description:
Everyone loves a flecked pair of socks. Fortunately for you, Yarn Works do a very nice pair. Featuring a slightly thicker, ribbed cotton construction, these socks will take you from your city pad to the Highlands in comfort. Or the office, or wherever. Here they are in red with orange and grey accents.

95% cotton
5% polyester

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44

name: Yarn Works 6 Green
description:
Everyone loves a flecked pair of socks. Fortunately for you, Yarn Works do a very nice pair. Featuring a slightly thicker, ribbed cotton construction, these socks will take you from your city pad to the Highlands in comfort. Or the movies, or wherever. Here they are in green with a pinch of khaki thrown in for good measure.

95% cotton
5% polyester

ONE SIZE

European 41-44

name: Yarn Works 6 Brown
description:
Everyone loves a flecked pair of socks. Fortunately for you, Yarn Works do a very nice pair. Featuring a slightly thicker, ribbed cotton construction, these socks will take you from your city pad to the Highlands in comfort. Or the pub, or wherever. Here they are in shades of brown and green.

95% cotton
5% polyester

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44

name: Yarn Works 5 Red, Mustard and Grey
description:
A common feature of Islamic and Byzantine decorative arts and architecture, the “zigzag” was first described as such in the late 17th century in a French book. These days, the ancient zigzag pops up on all manner of things, including these red, mustard and grey Yarn Works socks.

95% cotton
5% polyester

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44

name: Yarn Works 5 Grey, Red and Black
description:
A common feature of Islamic and Byzantine decorative arts and architecture, the “zigzag” was first described as such in the late 17th century—by a Frenchie no less. These days, the ancient zigzag pops up on all manner of things, including these grey, red and black Yarn Works socks.

95% cotton
5% polyester

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44

name: Yarn Works 5 Grey, Black and White
description:
A common feature of Islamic and Byzantine decorative arts and architecture, the “zigzag” was first described as such in the late 17th century—by a Frenchie no less. These days, the ancient zigzag pops up on all manner of things, including these grey, black and white Yarn Works socks.

95% cotton
5% polyester

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44

name: Yarn Works 3 Red, Navy and Yellow
description:
There is something a tad Scandinavian about the Yarn Works 3s. Pictured here in navy, red and yellow, these jacquard knitted socks call to mind the pitched roofs and thatched fields of northern Europe. But don’t worry. They are nice and cool with a 100% cotton body.

95% cotton
5% polyester

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44

name: Yarn Works 3 Orange and Pale Blue
description:
There is something a tad Scandinavian about the Yarn Works 3s. Pictured here in orange and pale blue, these jacquard knitted socks call to mind the pitched roofs and thatched fields of northern Europe. But don’t worry. They are nice and cool with a 100% cotton body.

95% cotton
5% polyester

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44

name: Yarn Works 3 Red and Blue
description:
There is something a tad Scandanavian about the Yarn Works 3s. Pictured here in red and blue, these jacquard knitted socks call to mind the pitched roofs and thatched fields of northern Europe. But don’t worry. They are nice and cool with a 100% cotton body.

95% cotton
5% polyester

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44

name: Yarn Works 1 Watermelon Check
description:
Watermelon Man. You know—the Herbie Hancock tune. These Yarn Works socks probably aren’t quite watermelony enough to earn you a new moniker, but they do look the goods with a pair of old school sneakers and jeans.

95% cotton
5% polyester

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44

name: Yarn Works 1 Mustard Check
description:
“You can’t cook an omelette without breaking eggs; every cook will tell you that.” That’s what Colonel Mustard said in Clue and we tend to agree. Plough through your day in these Mustard check Yarn Works socks. You won’t care if you break an egg here and there.

95% cotton
5% polyester

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44

name: Yarn Works 1 Grey Check
description:
There ain’t nothing drab about these grey Yarn Works socks. Featuring a nice tight weave and a simple check pattern, these jacquard knitted socks add just the right amount of flair to your outfit. We’re thinking a light coloured, summer weight suit or a pair of pale chinos would work.

95% cotton
5% polyester

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-10
European 41-44

name: Democratique Socks Originals Solid Petroleum Blue
description:
Take a stand without making a statement. Forget about navy blue. Petroleum blue is where it’s at. Equally at home concealed under a nice suit or filling the gap between some turned up chinos and a chukka boot, these guys are as versatile as they are cool.

75% cotton
23% polyamide
2% elastine

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-11
European 41-46

name: Democratique Socks Originals DotCom Purple/Green
description:
The magical symbiosis represented by the ecclesiastical purple and the— Hang on. We’re channelling 'Four Weddings and a Funeral'. Let’s backtrack. Purple and green look great together. And hey, if you want to make like Hugh Grant and go running down the street after a curly-haired American broad wearing shorts, brogues and these Democratique socks, we’re not going to stop you.

75% cotton
23% polyamide
2% elastine

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-11
European 41-46

name: Democratique Socks Originals Solid Mint Green
description:
When we think mint, we think mojitos. It’s not a bad image to conjure when you’re pulling up your socks ahead of another day at the office, is it? Looking down at your minty Democratiques every now and then might just get you through those interminable meetings. Who’d have thought a simple pair of socks could be so refreshing?

75% cotton
23% polyamide
2% elastine

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-11
European 41-46

name: Democratique Socks Originals Striper Navy/White/Orange
description:
Harking back to a time when sports wear did not refer to track suits and sweat pants, these stripy Democratique socks work courtside and, really, wherever else you want to wear them. We think they look the goods with a navy blue boat shoe or a pair of canvas sneakers. You might have other ideas.

75% cotton
23% polyamide
2% elastine

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-11
European 41-46

name: Democratique Socks Originals DotCom Red/Orange
description:
Orange County. Home to Disneyland, Huntington Beach and the eponymous TV show. And the inspiration behind the bold orange polka dots you see before you on these Democratique socks. They're not for the faint hearted, but then neither is Orange County.

75% cotton
23% polyamide
2% elastine

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-11
European 41-46

name: Democratique Socks Originals Striper Army/Sand
description:
One of the more subdued designs from the gang at Democratique, these sand and army green striped numbers are just about perfect for a Down Under summer. Pair them with some khaki chinos, a pair of moccasins and a loose tee for a Hipster-meets-M.A.S.H. look.

75% cotton
23% polyamide
2% elastine

ONE SIZE
Approximately UK 7-11
European 41-46
